sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均表示"单调的，乏味的，厌烦的"之意。
means: dull ： 指缺乏鲜明、吸引力或情趣而显得乏味、沉闷。
tedious ： 侧重指文章、演讲、演出等冗长乏味或环境等单调、沉闷，缺乏活力，使感到不舒服。
monotonous ： 指没有变化、重复单调的。
dreary ： 侧重无趣味的，不活泼的事或思想状态。

sentence.Network_en: The otherwise dreary book is enlivened by some very amusing illustrations.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本枯燥乏味的书幸亏加了一些精彩的插图才变得生动有趣.

PerfectNetExp.abs: blue的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... Wearing blue. 身着蓝装的 Dismal;dreary: 阴郁的；沉闷的： a blue day. 乏味的一天.
萧字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 同本义〖 wormwood〗 萧条,冷落;荒凉〖 desolate;dreary〗 稀疏〖 rare〗.
尚忆单词网——爱上背单词 - Powered by Discuz! ... delicious 美味的、可口的 dreary 沉闷的，枯燥的 dumb 哑的、无言的.
大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... housework n. 家务劳动 dreary a. 沉闷乏味的 grind n. 苦差使.

list.abs: before I took my leave of this dreary place , I was cornered by an eccentric old man who seemed to an endless supply of anecdotes and folksy wisdom to impart .在我起身离开这个沉闷的地方之前，我遇到一个奇怪的老者，他好像有着无穷的秘密和智慧能够告诉我。
I hate these dry , dreary days ., 我讨厌干燥沉闷的天气!
Sundays were dreary days in that wintry season ., 在那酷冷严寒的季节 , 星期天是个悲哀的日子.
what was there to count ? there was only a bare , dreary yard to be seen , and the blank side of the brick house twenty feet away .外面有什么好数的呢?外面只看到一个空荡荡的沉闷的院子，还有20英尺开外那砖房的侧墙，上面什么也没有。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English drēorig 'gory, cruel', also 'melancholy', from drēor 'gore', of Germanic origin; related to German traurig 'sorrowful', also to drowsy, and probably to drizzle

entry.tran: 沉闷的;枯燥无味的;令人沮丧的
entry.def: If you describe something as dreary, you mean that it is dull and depressing.

example.ex: ...a dreary little town in the Midwest...
example.tran: 位于中西部的沉闷的小镇

sentences.sentence: "sorry routine that follows on the heels of death"- B.A.Williams

means.word_mean: 2. lacking in liveliness or charm or surprise;

sentences.sentence: "life was drab compared with the more exciting life style overseas"

auth_sentence.content: The dreary weather seems to be following the Mets.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The dreary weather seems to be following the Mets.

auth_sentence.content: Have you forgotten how godawfully dreary British architecture was?
auth_sentence.res_content: Have you forgotten how godawfully dreary British architecture was?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Have you forgotten how godawfully dreary British architecture was?

auth_sentence.content: Think about how dreary the Nets were as a brand.

means.word_mean: 令人厌烦的; 单调的; 枯燥的

sentences.en: It was the dreariest job I had ever done.
sentences.cn: 那是我所做过的最沉闷的工作。

jushi.english: Addressing envelopes all the time is dreary work.
jushi.chinese: 老是往信封上写地址是件乏味的工作。

jushi.english: I'm afraid it's been a dreary instead of a sunny autumn.
jushi.chinese: 恐怕已是阴郁的秋天，而不是阳光明媚的秋天了。

jushi.english: It was the dreariest job I had ever done.
jushi.chinese: 那是我所做过的最沉闷的工作。
